forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plenty of sunshine. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plenty of sunshine. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then becoming cloudy with a wind-driven rain after midnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Gusty winds developing. Mostly clear skies giving way to cloudy skies with periods of rain overnight. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 17C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 61F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early followed by increasing clouds and some light rain later at night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
